Offering a smooth ride on all terrains, the four tires are puncture-proof with advanced central joint suspension for effortless pushing, ensuring you always have control. description: The Kith for Bugaboo Fox 5 is a fully custom, 2-in-1 everyday essential stroller, featuring all-over Kith monogram logo branding and embroidered detailing. Designed to hold your newborn with first-class comfort all the way through their toddler years, the Fox 5 comes with a spacious bassinet and convertible toddler seat, crafted with sustainable bio-based materials and a large extendable canopy, providing sun protection up to UPF 50+. Offering a smooth ride on all terrains, the four tires are puncture-proof with advanced central joint suspension for effortless pushing, ensuring you always have control. Lastly, the Fox 5 features one-handed control, with the ability to fold up or down, recline the seat, adjust the handlebar, and more without sacrificing time.

description: The Kith for Bugaboo Fox 5 is a fully custom, 2-in-1 everyday essential stroller, featuring all-over Kith monogram logo branding and embroidered detailing. Designed to hold your newborn with first-class comfort all the way through their toddler years, the Fox 5 comes with a spacious bassinet and convertible toddler seat, crafted with sustainable bio-based materials and a large extendable canopy, providing sun protection up to UPF 50+. Offering a smooth ride on all terrains, the four tires are puncture-proof with advanced central joint suspension for effortless pushing, ensuring you always have control. Lastly, the Fox 5 features one-handed control, with the ability to fold up or down, recline the seat, adjust the handlebar, and more without sacrificing time.
